name: SBS-Bieganski
description: This project involves improving the Scrum board simulator application by the way of utilizing Agile methods.

memberships.invitation_extra_text: Welcome to the SER 516 project Scrum board ;)
Welcome to the SER 516 project Scrum board!

epiccustomattributes.name: Business Value
epiccustomattributes.description: This value reflects the business value of the epic

snapshot.subject: Add new features
snapshot.description: This Epic involves adding new features to the Scrum Board Simulator to make it more useful
snapshot.description_html: This Epic involves adding new features to the Scrum Board Simulator to make it more useful

epics.subject: Add new features
epics.description: This Epic involves adding new features to the Scrum Board Simulator to make it more useful

snapshot.subject: Enhance the GUI
snapshot.description: This Epic involves enhancing the graphical user interface so that it reflects the features added
snapshot.description_html: This Epic involves enhancing the graphical user interface so that it reflects the features added

epics.subject: Enhance the GUI
epics.description: This Epic involves enhancing the graphical user interface so that it reflects the features added

snapshot.subject: Integration
snapshot.description: This Epic involves integrating the Scrum Board simulator with Taiga: a real Scrum Board tool
snapshot.description_html: This Epic involves integrating the Scrum Board simulator with Taiga: a real Scrum Board tool

epics.subject: Integration
epics.description: This Epic involves integrating the Scrum Board simulator with Taiga: a real Scrum Board tool

snapshot.subject: Reducing Technical Debt
snapshot.description: This Epic involves updating and enhancing the source code to make the program capable of running with newest JDK and JavaFX libraries and run more efficiently
snapshot.description_html: This Epic involves updating and enhancing the source code to make the program capable of running with newest JDK and JavaFX libraries and run more efficiently

epics.subject: Reducing Technical Debt
epics.description: This Epic involves updating and enhancing the source code to make the program capable of running with newest JDK and JavaFX libraries and run more efficiently

snapshot.subject: Update the Java version and supporting libraries
snapshot.description: As a developer I want to be able to build the project using recent development tools so that my tools are up-to-date
snapshot.description_html: As a developer I want to be able to build the project using recent development tools so that my tools are up-to-date

user_stories.subject: Update the Java version and supporting libraries
user_stories.description: As a developer I want to be able to build the project using recent development tools so that my tools are up-to-date

snapshot.subject: Team maturity value
snapshot.description: As a Scrum developer I want the ability to provide a team maturity value to make the simulation better resemble the behavior of my actual team
snapshot.description_html: As a Scrum developer I want the ability to provide a team maturity value to make the simulation better resemble the behavior of my actual team

user_stories.subject: Team maturity value
user_stories.description: As a Scrum developer I want the ability to provide a team maturity value to make the simulation better resemble the behavior of my actual team

snapshot.subject: Step through simulation
snapshot.description: As a Scrum developer I want the ability to pause the simulation and step through each day so I can see the progress for each day
snapshot.description_html: As a Scrum developer I want the ability to pause the simulation and step through each day so I can see the progress for each day

user_stories.subject: Step through simulation
user_stories.description: As a Scrum developer I want the ability to pause the simulation and step through each day so I can see the progress for each day

snapshot.subject: Add an ability to add teams
snapshot.description: As a scrum developer, I would want to add new teams so that performance of newly made teams can be tracked.
snapshot.description_html: As a scrum developer, I would want to add new teams so that performance of newly made teams can be tracked.

user_stories.subject: Add an ability to add teams
user_stories.description: As a scrum developer, I would want to add new teams so that performance of newly made teams can be tracked.

snapshot.subject: Integration with Taiga
snapshot.description: As a Scrum developer, I want the Scrum Board Simulator to retrieve the values from Taiga so that we I can simulate a Sprint to try and predict the Sprint outcome
snapshot.description_html: As a Scrum developer, I want the Scrum Board Simulator to retrieve the values from Taiga so that we I can simulate a Sprint to try and predict the Sprint outcome

user_stories.subject: Integration with Taiga
user_stories.description: As a Scrum developer, I want the Scrum Board Simulator to retrieve the values from Taiga so that we I can simulate a Sprint to try and predict the Sprint outcome

snapshot.subject: Modify velocity value
snapshot.description: As a Scrum developer I want the ability to modify the velocity value to generate a simulation that more resembles that of my own team
snapshot.description_html: As a Scrum developer I want the ability to modify the velocity value to generate a simulation that more resembles that of my own team

user_stories.subject: Modify velocity value
user_stories.description: As a Scrum developer I want the ability to modify the velocity value to generate a simulation that more resembles that of my own team

snapshot.subject: Switch between burndown and burn-up charts
snapshot.description: As a developer, I want to be able to switch between the views of the burndown and burn-up charts to track the actual work done in the sprint.
snapshot.description_html: As a developer, I want to be able to switch between the views of the burndown and burn-up charts to track the actual work done in the sprint.

user_stories.subject: Switch between burndown and burn-up charts
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to be able to switch between the views of the burndown and burn-up charts to track the actual work done in the sprint.

snapshot.subject: Idealized burnup/down lines
snapshot.description: As a developer, I want to see the idealized burn-up or burndown lines in the burn-up/down charts so that I can compare the actual work being done to how much work is to be done.
snapshot.description_html: As a developer, I want to see the idealized burn-up or burndown lines in the burn-up/down charts so that I can compare the actual work being done to how much work is to be done.

user_stories.subject: Idealized burnup/down lines
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to see the idealized burn-up or burndown lines in the burn-up/down charts so that I can compare the actual work being done to how much work is to be done.

snapshot.subject: Add more User Stories
snapshot.description: As a scrum developer, I want to add more user stories in the simulation, to see how it can impact the  completion of the sprint and also the burn-up/burndown chart.
snapshot.description_html: As a scrum developer, I want to add more user stories in the simulation, to see how it can impact the completion of the sprint and also the burn-up/burndown chart.

user_stories.subject: Add more User Stories
user_stories.description: As a scrum developer, I want to add more user stories in the simulation, to see how it can impact the  completion of the sprint and also the burn-up/burndown chart.

snapshot.subject: Provide an ability to create new strategies
snapshot.description: As an engineer, I want to provide an ability to create new strategies, so it can design strategies.
snapshot.description_html: As an engineer, I want to provide an ability to create new strategies, so it can design strategies.

user_stories.subject: Provide an ability to create new strategies
user_stories.description: As an engineer, I want to provide an ability to create new strategies, so it can design strategies.
